title: Sportika
text:
Sportika is an Italian <a href="sports%20equipment">sports equipment</a> manufacturing company based in <a href="Ovada">Ovada</a>. The company produces <a href="sportswear">sportswear</a>, mainly <a href="kit%20%28association%20football%29">football kits</a>, <a href="t-shirt">t-shirt</a>s, <a href="jacket">jacket</a>s, <a href="leggins">leggins</a>, among other products.
History.
Sportika was founded in 1982 by Carlo Crosio who is a sports and sportswear enthusiast from Ovada. Over the years it grew to eventually supply kits for clubs at all levels of <a href="Italy">Italian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a>, the <a href="Kategoria%20superiore">Albanian Premier League</a>, and lower-level <a href="Europe">Europe</a>an football clubs.
